channel.title: Remove this Confusion
channel.description: Everytime I play, and I'm not usually mind linked with a Psychic, but sometimes I go to the Psychic tab and then I get confused and forget I'm on the Psychic tab and then I can't talk the rest of the game because I'm a dingus and forget to click General. But anyways, I can't be the only one this has happened to. Soooo my suggestion is, how about have the Psychic tab like, not be there if it's not being used? (i.e. if you're not mind linked, or Psychic mind linking with someone). But, yeaaa. Please. :frowning: ![image|646x500](upload://f5S02VzhOeX9mP3kSVKwL5UNykT.jpg) this small problem has lost me many a' game.

item.title: Remove this Confusion
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
How about making the normal text not appear in the psychic chat. Then just make it auto select the General chat after a night that you were linked

Read full topic

item.title: Remove this Confusion
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I think text should be different font when in psychic tab

Read full topic

item.title: Remove this Confusion
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
This. And I don’t understand also why the psychic tab is always there even if THERE ISNT A PSYCHIC IN THE GAME.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove this Confusion
item.dc:creator: Methnor
item.description:
Best solution would probably be the game automatically activating the General tab when the day starts.

Read full topic

I quickly figure this out

Not everyone is as smart as you Rope

item.description:
Everytime I play, and I’m not usually mind linked with a Psychic, but sometimes I go to the Psychic tab and then I get confused and forget I’m on the Psychic tab and then I can’t talk the rest of the game because I’m a dingus and forget to click General. But anyways, I can’t be the only one this has happened to. Soooo my suggestion is, how about have the Psychic tab like, not be there if it’s not being used? (i.e. if you’re not mind linked, or Psychic mind linking with someone). But, yeaaa. Please.

this small problem has lost me many a’ game.
